name: Thumb Gen
description: An open-source YouTube thumbnail generator that lets creators design engaging video previews with customizable templates and tools.

name: CoCurso
description: The main Colchete plataform that provides Colchete knowlege in a easy and interative way, with Blockhain, Linux and Bitcoin courses.

name: NFT Gen
description: A tool to generate images to NFT collections, with high quality and a lot of variations.
